name: Sewer Pipe line Installation
steps: Submit an application to the local municipal corporation or the concerned department.
Provide necessary documents such as land ownership proof and address verification.
Approval and feasibility study by the authority.
Payment of required charges.
Allotment of contractor for pipeline installation.
Final testing and approval of installation.
Service activation and issuance of a completion certificate.

name: Gas Pipeline Connection
steps: Submit an online or offline application to the gas distribution company.
Provide necessary KYC documents and land ownership proof.
Inspection of premises by the gas company.
Approval and quotation for installation charges.
Payment of fees and security deposit.
Pipeline installation and safety checks.
Activation of gas connection and issuance of customer ID.

nearest_access_locations.address: Indane Gas Office, Salt Lake, Kolkata - 700091

name: Water Pipeline Connection
steps: Submit an application to the local water supply department.
Attach necessary documents such as address proof, land ownership certificate, and identity verification.
Inspection by water department officials.
Approval and estimation of charges.
Payment of fees and security deposit.
Installation of water pipeline and meter connection.
Final verification and activation of water supply.

nearest_access_locations.address: Metro Water Office, T. Nagar, Chennai - 600017

name: Road Construction Permission
steps: Submit a request to the local Public Works Department (PWD) or municipal corporation.
Attach detailed project plans, land records, and NOCs from relevant authorities.
Approval and site inspection by government engineers.
Allocation of funds (if applicable) and contractor selection.
Execution of road construction work.
Final quality checks and approvals.
Road opening for public use.

name: Streetlight Installation
steps: Submit an application to the electricity board or municipal authority.
Provide necessary documents including a request letter and location details.
Approval and feasibility study by the authority.
Budget allocation and approval of funds.
Installation of streetlights.
Final inspection and activation of the lights.

name: Solar Panel Installation Permission
steps: Apply to the state renewable energy development agency.
Submit property documents and ID proof.
Inspection by the renewable energy board.
Approval and subsidy processing (if applicable).
Installation by an authorized vendor.
Final certification and activation.
